component.name: Aerion
component.summary: Lightweight open-source email client for Linux

description.p: Aerion is a modern, lightweight email client inspired by Geary, focused on resource efficiency and a clean user experience.

ul.li: Multiple email accounts with unified inbox
Support for Gmail, Outlook, and generic IMAP/SMTP
Conversation threading
Rich text WYSIWYG composer with TipTap editor
Contact sync (CardDAV, Google, Microsoft) for auto-completion
Dark mode and multiple color themes
Keyboard-friendly navigation with vim-style shortcuts
Detachable composer window
Basic tracking element removal from emails
PGP and S/MIME experimental support
